document.full_text: the main highway between north dakota and the flooded canadian province of manitoba was set to be closed on monday, but two nearby rail lines remained open as the province prepared for the red river's second-highest levels on record.
document.title: red river flooding closes key manitoba highway
lines_and_colors: the main highway between north dakota and the flooded canadian province of manitoba was set to be closed on monday, but two nearby rail lines remained open as the province prepared for the red river's second-highest levels on record.
